thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN PREMIER Herald Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Warm and Welcome Stay
thread.title_full: Warm and Welcome Stay - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Herald Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Alyssa D
title: Warm and Welcome Stay
text: This is a great centrally located hotel that's also easy on the wallet. We chose it due to its location and were impressed with the warm and courteous staff and overall cleanliness of the hotel. The rooms are small, but they are efficient and well designed. The only issue we had was from the loud street noise which can easily be alleviated by wearing the provided ear plugs.
